titleStmt.title: An answer to the maidens frollick: or, The taylors resolution to be reveng'd of these petticoat press-masters, by bob-tailing their gowns and petticoats for the future, more than ever they have done heretofore. To the tune of, An orange. Licensed according to order.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for P. Brooksby, J. Deacon, J. Blare, J. Black [i.e. Back,

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing.
Verse: "'Tis not long ago, good people you know ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
